Free Standard Delivery & Returns | DETAILS
Sites-RLEU_Sterling-Site
Complimentary Delivery offer valid on full price orders shipped in the Netherlands and applies to Standard Delivery only. Gift certificates, taxes, additional shipping and handling do not count toward the qualifying amount. Not valid for cash. Previous Purchases are not eligible for adjustments. To participate, simply add merchandise to your shopping basket and complimentary Standard Delivery will automatically be applied. You must select the "Standard Delivery" option to receive the complimentary shipping offer. If you have questions, please contact Customer Assistance by email at CustomerAssistance@RalphLauren.fr or by phone at +31 (0) 20 2035212

    Cookie Preference Center

    • Your Privacy

    • Necessary Cookies

    • Analytics Cookies

    • Functionality Cookies

    • Personalised Advertising Cookies

    Your Privacy

    When you visit our site, it will store or retrieve information on your browser, using cookies and similar technologies (“cookies”). We use necessary cookies to make this site work. We and our partners also would like to set optional functionality, analytics and advertising cookies to improve the functionality of the site and personalise its content, to understand how you use this site, and to show personalised ads on other sites. These optional cookies won’t be set unless you enable them. You can choose not to enable some of them, but this may impact your experience of the site. Using this tool will set a cookie to remember your preferences. We will keep your preferences for 6 months. You can change your cookie preferences at any time by clicking “Cookie Settings” in our cookie notice. To learn more on the individual cookies used on our site and the third parties setting the cookies, click on the different category headings on the left.
    More information

    Necessary Cookies

    Always Active

    These cookies are necessary for the site to function and cannot be switched off in our systems. They are usually only set in response to actions made by you which amount to a request for services, such as setting your privacy or language preferences, storing your shopping cart items, logging in or filling in forms, enabling you to log into secure areas of our website. You may disable these by changing your browser settings, but this may affect how the website functions.

    Analytics Cookies

    These cookies are provided by third-party online analytics services to help us improve our site by collecting and reporting information on how you use it. If you do not allow these cookies, we will not know when you have visited our site, and will not be able to monitor its performance.

    Functionality Cookies

    These cookies enable the website to provide enhanced functionality, such as product size recommendations, and help us personalize content based on your use of the site. They may be set by us or by third party providers whose services we have added to our pages. If you do not allow these cookies, then some or all of these services may not function properly.

    Personalised Advertising Cookies

    These cookies are set through our site by our advertising partners. They may be used by those companies to build a profile of your interests and show you relevant adverts on other sites based on your profile. Third-party cookies used in online advertising include cookies used for various technical operations such as frequency capping, ad affiliation, click fraud detection, market research, product improvement, debugging and any other related purposes.
